subject: Golf
Wind
lead_paragraph: On a day when the PGA Tour meterologist reported winds gusting up to 20 m.p.h., Lucas Glover finished with a birdie for a 2-under 71 and a one-shot lead over Geoff Ogilvy.
snippet: On a day when the PGA Tour meterologist reported winds gusting up to 20 m.p.h., Lucas Glover finished with a birdie for a 2-under 71 and a one-shot lead over Geoff Ogilvy.
